r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Span::setResource as a legit method # 287 - Logging more span's info when in debug mode # 292
### Fixed - Symfony 4.2 traces generation #280 - Memory leak and misshandling of return value in PHP 5.4 #281 - Drupal crashes (temporary workaround) #285 - Tracing of http status code in generic web requests #288 - Route not set in symfony 3.4 when user calls exit() #289 - Fix hash table dtor for PHP 7 #290
